Author: Haplo064
Name: Accurate CountDown
Description: Shows the current countdown time.

Author: ackwell
Name: Browser Host
Description:
Dalamud plugin for in-game browser rendering. Think OverlayPlugin, but it's in the game itself.
Use the settings button below or the /pbrowser command to configure.

Author: kij
Name: ChatCoordinates
Description: This plugin transforms coordinates from chat to XIV MapLink

Author: jkcclemens
Name: Custom Commands and Macro Macros
Description: This command allows you to create custom commands (not yet implemented) and unrestricted macros.

Author: goat
Name: Discord Rich Presence
Description: This plugin allows you to set up chat triggers.

Author: perchbird
Name: Damage Info Plugin
Description: Configurable UI options for damage fly text. /dmginfo displays the config.

Author: Caraxi
Name: FPS Plugin
Description: Display game FPS. /pfps to open config

Author: ascclemens
Name: Globetrotter
Description: Automatically shows where treasure maps are located. /pglobetrogger /tmap

Author: ascclemens
Name: Good Memory
Description: Adds an indicator in item tooltips to show whether you have acquired that item.

Author: ascclemens
Name: HudSwap
Description: Automatically changes your HUD layout for you. /phudswap

Author: Bluefissure
Name: Inviter
Description: Automatically invite people to your party (doesn't work for CWLS). /xinvite to open.

Author: Caraxi
Name: Item Search Plugin
Description: Search for items. Type /xlitem to open search window.

Author: NR
Name: LogFilter
Description: Turn off log filter.

Author: Caraxi
Name: MacroRecursion
Description: Execute macros from macros. /runmacro ## [shared] [line]

Author: Bluefissure
Name: MapLinker
Description: Automatically record the maplinks in chat and retrieval later.

Author: fmauNeko
Name: Market board
Description: Browse the market board. /pmb to open.

Author: attick
Name: Mouseover Action
Description: This plugin allows for macro-like use of actions without any macro delay.

Author: luminisward
Name: MP Timer
Description: BLM MP Timer for XivLauncher/Dalamud.

Author: meli
Name: Orchestrion Plugin
Description: Adds a simple front-end for browsing and changing the in-game BGM.  /porch to open

Author: goat
Name: OwO
Description: This plugin uwu's your chat.

Author: ascclemens
Name: Peeping Tom
Description: Shows who is or was targeting you. /ptom

Author: tesu
Name: Penny Pincher
Description: Copies 1 below the cheapest offer to your clipboard when you check marketboard prices. /penny help

Author: karashiiro
Name: PingPlugin
Description: A ping display plugin for Dalamud.

Author: Haplo064
Name: Pixel Perfect Plugin
Description: Adds an indicator of your hitbox.

Author: kalilistic
Name: PriceCheck
Description: Quickly price check your items.

Author: Caraxi
Name: Remind Me
Description:
Cooldown and Status tracking.
/remindme

Author: Caraxi
Name: Simple Tweaks
Description:
Collection of simple ideas that are too small to warrent their own plugin.
/tweaks to open the config
Tweaks:
 - Lock chat size and position.
 - Show exact percentage for item durability and spiritbond.
 - Show current desynthesis level on desynthable items.
 - Disable title screen movie.
 - Copy item name with CTRL-C.
 - Show average item level when examining other players.
 - Command to open character directory.
 - Command to change tooltip settings.

Author: Haplo064
Name: SlideCast Plugin
Description: Adds an indicator of when it's safe to move while casting

Author: karashiiro
Name: SoundSetter
Description: A Dalamud plugin that allows volume control from anywhere, including gpose and cutscenes.

Author: Pohky
Name: Teleporter
Description: Chat Commands for teleporting to Aetherytes. /tp for help

Author: SheepGoMeh
Name: Visibility
Description: This plugin controls the visibility of players, pets, minions and chocobos.

Author: PunishedPineapple
Name: Waymark Preset Plugin
Description: Manage waymark presets.  Use "/pwaymark help" for more information.

Author: attick
Name: XIV Combo
Description: This plugin condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button.
